page.title: Basic, Single-Clause Sentences - Agreement Features
page.instruction:
Verbs and auxiliaries may also carry agreement features that force agreement with the subject, and sometimes also with the direct object. Key the appropriate features on the relevant affixes. In the case of animacy, this is most likely not an affix but a property of the individual verbâ€™s semantics whether its subject and/or object must be animate, so those features will need to be keyed on the verb entry.
person first_subjectfirst_object the subject must be first personthe object must be first person
first_exclusive_subjectfirst_exclusive_object the subject must be first person exclusivethe object must be first person exclusive
first_inclusive_subjectfirst_inclusive_object the subject must be first person inclusivethe object must be first person inclusive
second_subjectsecond_object the subject must be second personthe object must be second person
third_subjectthird_object the subject must be third personthe object must be third person
number singular_subjectsingular_object the subject must be singularthe object must be singular
dual_subjectdual_object the subject must be dualthe object must be dual
plural_subjectplural_object the subject must be pluralthe object must be plural
gender masculine_subjectmasculine_object the subject must be masculinethe object must be masculine
feminine_subjectfeminine_object the subject must be femininethe object must be feminine
neuter_subjectneuter_object the subject must be neuterthe object must be neuter
animacy animate_subjectanimate_object the subject must be animatethe object must be animate
-animate_subject-animate_object the subject must be inanimatethe object must be inanimate
class class_##_subjectclass_##_object (replace ## with the class number up to 99)
